sense.name: substance of colored pigment applied as a coating on surfaces
sense.examples: This brand of interior paint is better than those. John brushed an oil-based primer on the fence, before adding a topcoat of latex paint. The artist squeezed tubes of paint onto his palette.

sense.name: facial cosmetics
sense.examples: John told Sally she was prettier without all that paint on her face. The dancers added some paint to their cheeks and lips before going onstage.

sense.name: the act of applying pigment to a surface
sense.examples: They gave the old house a paint and a roof repair. John decided to give his car a paint.

sense.name: rectangular floor region near the basket of a basketball court
sense.examples: The two players jostled in the paint. He dominates play in the paint.

sense.name: computer functionality that generates surface-coverage graphics
sense.examples: Mary created the invitations using a simple paint program on her laptop. There are several modes for 'paint' including an airbrush effect.

sense.name: piebald horse
sense.examples: The cowboy in the black hat rode a paint into town. Mary's horse is a paint and Sally's horse is a palomino.
